scripts.dev: pkill -f 'next dev' || true && cross-env PORT=9192 next dev --turbopack
scripts.dev:with-ngrok: pkill -f 'next' || true && pkill -f 'ngrok' || true && pkill -f 'node.*magic-lawyer' || true && sleep 2 && concurrently "npm run dev" "ngrok http 9192" "node scripts/wait-and-cleanup.js"
scripts.db:reset: docker compose -f docker-compose.db.yml down -v && docker compose -f docker-compose.db.yml up -d
scripts.db:reset-dev: npm run db:down && rm -rf prisma/migrations && npm run db:up && PRISMA_USER_CONSENT_FOR_DANGEROUS_AI_ACTION="SIM, quero resetar o banco de desenvolvimento" npx prisma db push --force-reset --accept-data-loss && npm run prisma:seed && npm run dev
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run db:up && npm run prisma:generate && npm run prisma:migrate && npm run prisma:seed
scripts.setup:dev: pkill -f 'next' || true && pkill -f 'ngrok' || true && pkill -f 'node.*magic-lawyer' || true && npm run redis:stop && sleep 2 && npm run redis:start && npm install && npm run db:up && rm -rf prisma/migrations && PRISMA_USER_CONSENT_FOR_DANGEROUS_AI_ACTION="SIM, quero resetar o banco de desenvolvimento" npx prisma db push --force-reset --accept-data-loss && npm run prisma:seed && concurrently "npm run dev:with-ngrok" "npm run dev:worker"
scripts.setup:dev:warm: pkill -f 'next' || true && pkill -f 'ngrok' || true && pkill -f 'node.*magic-lawyer' || true && npm run redis:stop && sleep 2 && npm run redis:start && npm install && npm run db:up && npx prisma db push && npm run prisma:seed && concurrently "npm run dev:with-ngrok" "npm run dev:worker"
scripts.setup:dev:windows: powershell -Command "Get-Process node, next, ngrok -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Stop-Process -Force; Start-Sleep -Seconds 2; npm install; npm run db:up; if (Test-Path prisma/migrations) { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force prisma/migrations }; $env:PRISMA_USER_CONSENT_FOR_DANGEROUS_AI_ACTION='SIM, quero resetar o banco de desenvolvimento'; npx prisma db push --force-reset --accept-data-loss; npm run prisma:seed; Get-Process node, ngrok -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Stop-Process -Force; Start-Sleep -Seconds 2; concurrently 'npm run dev' 'ngrok http 9192' 'node scripts/wait-and-cleanup.js'"
scripts.clean: npm run db:down && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf .next
scripts.stop: pkill -f 'next' || true && pkill -f 'ngrok' || true && pkill -f 'node.*magic-lawyer' || true
scripts.stop:all: pkill -f 'next' || true && pkill -f 'ngrok' || true && pkill -f 'node.*magic-lawyer' || true && npm run redis:stop && npm run db:down
scripts.kill:all: pkill -f 'next' || true && pkill -f 'ngrok' || true && pkill -f 'node.*magic-lawyer' || true && pkill -f 'concurrently' || true && sleep 3
scripts.notifications:crons: curl -sSf -X GET "http://localhost:9192/api/cron/check-deadlines" -H "Authorization: Bearer ${CRON_SECRET:-test-secret}" > /dev/null && curl -sSf -X GET "http://localhost:9192/api/cron/check-contracts" -H "Authorization: Bearer ${CRON_SECRET:-test-secret}" > /dev/null
scripts.notifications:all: npm run notifications:test && npm run notifications:webhook && npm run notifications:smoke && npm run notifications:crons
